Uses of Class
game.board.CoordBoard

  • Packages that use CoordBoard 
    Package Description
    game.board
    Package to include in Graph abstract class and its implementation to a board for the Hex game (considering hexagons).
    game.user
    Package to include the Player class, which defines individual players, check if each player move is valid, add them to the game board and verify when a player wins.

    • Uses of CoordBoard in game.board

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoordBoard HexBoard.check_coords(int[] ij)
      Check if the two first components of ij make a valid coordinate.
      CoordBoard HexBoard.check_coords(int i, int j)
      Check if the points i and j make a valid coordinate.
      static CoordBoard CoordBoard.get_coord(int pos, int board_size)
      Function to return, for a given position in a 1D array, the corresponding Obj.
